snippet: Staff at Bank of Ireland, the country's largest bank by assets, are set to receive their first pay increase in six years after the part state-owned lender reached an agreement with its largest trade union on Friday....

headline.print_headline: Bank of Ireland Staff Set for First Pay Rise Since Crisis
headline.main: Bank of Ireland Staff Set for First Pay Rise Since Crisis

lead_paragraph: Staff at Bank of Ireland, the country's largest bank by assets, are set to receive their first pay increase in six years after the part state-owned lender reached an agreement with its largest trade union on Friday.
